metadata.title: CVE-2012-5644 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
libuser has information disclosure when moving user's home directory

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5644` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libuser - 1:0.60~dfsg-1.2
libuser1 - 1:0.60~dfsg-1.2
python3-libuser - 1:0.60~dfsg-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libuser package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.60~dfsg-1.2').
